characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a red car, driver of a bus
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. The traffic is moderate, with several vehicles ahead and to the sides. The white sedan in front maintains a consistent speed, while the red car on the left side is slightly ahead. The bus on the right side is moving at a similar pace to the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and staying in its lane. The driver is cautious, keeping a safe distance from the vehicles ahead and to the sides. No sudden changes in speed or direction are observed.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Left side: A red car, approximately 5 meters away, slightly ahead of the self-driving vehicle. 3) Right side: A bus, approximately 5 meters away, moving at a similar pace to the self-driving vehicle.
